description: A big, boisterous female mechanic, who`s been assigned to the Albion as maintenance chief for the prototype Gundams. Happy to play the big sister, Mora is often seen playing confidant to Nina or protecting her pretty assistants from the grabby hands of Bernard Monsha. Early on, she takes a shine to Chuck Keith, and this happy couple provides a cheery contrast to the tempestuous relationship between Kou and Nina.
name: Mora Bascht
